Gear.Name: Protein
Gear.Description:
Increases a Pokes Attack by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.
Genemon Rulebook]]>

Gear.Name: Iron
Gear.Description: Increases a Pokes Defense by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Gear.Name: Calcium
Gear.Description: Increases a Pokes Special Attack by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Gear.Name: Zink
Gear.Description: Increases a Pokes Special Defense by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Gear.Name: Carbos
Gear.Description: Increases a Pokes Speed by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Gear.Name: HP Up
Gear.Description: Increases a Pokes HP by 1. A Poke is only capable of having a single Vitamin.

Gear.Name: Pokedex
Gear.Description: A hand-held computer with an advanced camera and image recognition software given to trainers at the start of their journey

Gear.Name: Old Rod
Gear.Description: Can be used to seach for Pokes in water. It does not look very sturdy.

Gear.Name: Good Rod
Gear.Description: Can be used to seach for Pokes in water

Gear.Name: Super Rod
Gear.Description: Can be used to seach for Pokes in water. Shiny!

Gear.Name: Escape Rope
Gear.Description: Can be used to Escape Wild Battle without a check

Gear.Name: Binoculars
Gear.Description: Removes 1 setback die due to distance

Gear.Name: Flashlight
Gear.Description: Removes 1 setback die due to darkness

Gear.Name: Flint and steel
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty of survival check to make fire

Gear.Name: Lantern
Gear.Description: Removes 2 setback die due to darkness

Gear.Name: Thieves Tols
Gear.Description: Allows the ability to pick locks

Gear.Name: Honey
Gear.Description: Attracts a random Poke native to the area

Gear.Name: Great Ball
Gear.Description: Gain a blue on capture attemps

Gear.Name: Ultra Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts

Gear.Name: Fast Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts three times if using against a poke with 3 speed or more

Gear.Name: Lure Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts three times if target is in water outside of battle

Gear.Name: Heavy Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade your capture attempt if target poke weights less than 100 kg, Downgrade the difficulty on capture if target Poke weighs 200 kgs < 300 kgs, Downgrade the difficulty on capture three times if target Poke weighs if 300 kgs or higher

Gear.Name: Love Ball
Gear.Description: Lower the difficulty by one and downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts four times if target is same species as your active poke and they are different genders

Gear.Name: Multi Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts twice if target has multiple heads

Gear.Name: Net Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is Water or Bug Type Poke

Gear.Name: Dive Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is in water

Gear.Name: Nest Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is a baby Poke

Gear.Name: Trap Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts twice if used in a forest or if target Poke is Normal Type

Gear.Name: Faraday Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if target is Electric or Steel Type Poke

Gear.Name: Repeat Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty and add a blue on capture attempts two times if you have a Poke of the same speciaes as the target

Gear.Name: Timer Ball
Gear.Description: If used on round 1 or outside of battle downgrade you capture attempt once. If used in round 3, 5, or 7 gain a blue on your capture attempt. If used on round 4 or 5 of battle downgrade the difficulty once, twice on rounds 6 and 7, and 3 times if used on or after round 8

Gear.Name: Premier Ball
Gear.Description: Gained for free if you buy 10 balls at once

Gear.Name: Dusk Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts twice if used in a cave or at night

Gear.Name: Heal Ball
Gear.Description: Fully heals target Poke when caught

Gear.Name: Quick Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts four times if used round 1 of battle

Gear.Name: Dream Ball
Gear.Description: Downgrade the difficulty on capture attempts three times if target is asleep

Gear.Name: Heal Powder
Gear.Description: Removes all Status Effects from a Poke. Tastes Bad.

Gear.Name: Revival Herb
Gear.Description: Revives a feinted Poke And heals all their wounds and Strain. Tastes Bad.

Gear.Name: Full Restore
Gear.Description: All HP and non-volatile Status Effects

Gear.Name: Full Heal
Gear.Description: Removes all Status Effects from a Poke.

Gear.Name: Revive
Gear.Description: Revives feinted Poke and heals Wounds and strain down to half their threshold rounded up.

Gear.Name: Max Revive
Gear.Description: Revives a feinted Poke And heals all their wounds and Strain. Tastes Bad.

Gear.Name: Fire Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Fire variant if availble

Gear.Name: Liquid Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Water variant if availble

Gear.Name: Leaf Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Grass variant if availble

Gear.Name: Dusk Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Dark variant if availble

Gear.Name: Refiner Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Steel variant if availble

Gear.Name: Sand Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Ground variant if availble

Gear.Name: Moon Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Rock variant if availble

Gear.Name: Sun Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Psychic variant if availble

Gear.Name: Feather Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Flying variant if availble

Gear.Name: Metamophasis Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Bug variant if availble

Gear.Name: Thunder Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Electric variant if availble

Gear.Name: ShinyStone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Normal variant if availble

Gear.Name: Reaper Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Ghost variant if availble

Gear.Name: Dragon Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Dragon variant if availble

Gear.Name: Pixy Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Fairy variant if availble

Gear.Name: Frozen Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Ice variant if availble

Gear.Name: Knuckle Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Fighting variant if availble

Gear.Name: Polluted Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Poison variant if availble

Gear.Name: Alolan Sand
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Alolan variant if availble

Gear.Name: Galarain Reath
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Galarian variant if availble

Gear.Name: Hisuian Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Hisuian variant if availble

Gear.Name: Tera Stone
Gear.Description: Evolves Poke into Paldean variant if availble

Gear.Name: Razz Berry
Gear.Description: Lowers the difficulty of capture attemps made against you

Gear.Name: Occa Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Fire Type move

Gear.Name: Pasho Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Water Type move

Gear.Name: Wacan Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Electric Type move

Gear.Name: Rindo Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Grass Type move

Gear.Name: Yeche Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Ice Type move

Gear.Name: Chople Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Fighting Type move

Gear.Name: Kebia Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Poison Type move

Gear.Name: Shuca Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Ground Type move

Gear.Name: Coba Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Flying Type move

Gear.Name: Payapa Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Psychic Type move

Gear.Name: Tanga Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Bug Type move

Gear.Name: Charti Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Rock Type move

Gear.Name: Kasib Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Ghost Type move

Gear.Name: Haban Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Dragon Type move

Gear.Name: Colbur Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Dark Type move

Gear.Name: Babiri Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Steel Type move

Gear.Name: Chilan Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Normal Type move

Gear.Name: Wepear Berry
Gear.Description: Halves the damage of a Fairy Type move

Gear.Name: Enigma Berry
Gear.Description: Add 4 Soak if hit by a move you are weak against

Gear.Name: Ability Shield
Gear.Description: Holder cannot have their abilities changed other Pokes

Gear.Name: Absorb Bulb
Gear.Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Water type move Wax 1

Gear.Name: Cell Battery
Gear.Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Electric type move Hone 1

Gear.Name: Luminous Moss
Gear.Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Water type move Encourage 1

Gear.Name: Snow Ball
Gear.Description: Once per battle if the holder is hit by a Ice type move Hone 1

Gear.Name: Air Balloon
Gear.Description: Holder is Airborn until hit by a damaging Move

Gear.Name: Amulet Coin
Gear.Description: Doubles the money gained from trainer battles is doubled if the holder is used in the battle

Gear.Name: Assault Vest
Gear.Description: At the begining of battle the holder gains Encourage 2 but they can no longer use non-damaging Moves

Gear.Name: Think Club
Gear.Description: At the begining of battle the holder gains Hone 1 or Hone 2 if the are Cubone

Gear.Name: Big Root
Gear.Description: When the holder recovers wounds from a Move they recover 1 additional

Gear.Name: Binding Band
Gear.Description: The DOT condition applied by the holder deal an aditional Wound

Gear.Name: Grip Claw
Gear.Description: The holders Moves with the Dot Property gain an additional rank

Gear.Name: Black Belt
Gear.Description: The holders Flighting Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Black Glasses
Gear.Description: The holders Dark Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Charcoal
Gear.Description: The holders Fire Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Dragon Fang
Gear.Description: The holders Dragon Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Soft Sand
Gear.Description: The holders Ground Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Hard Stone
Gear.Description: The holders Rock Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Never Melt Ice
Gear.Description: The holders Ice Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Silver Poweder
Gear.Description: The holders Bug Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Magnet
Gear.Description: The holders Electric Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Miracle Seed
Gear.Description: The holders Grass Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Metal Coat
Gear.Description: The holders Steel Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Twisted Spoon
Gear.Description: The holders Psychic Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Mystic Water
Gear.Description: The holders Water Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Silk Scarf
Gear.Description: The holders Normal Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Pixy Dust
Gear.Description: The holders Fairy Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Poision Barb
Gear.Description: The holders Poison Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Sharp Beak
Gear.Description: The holders Flying Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Spell tag
Gear.Description: The holders Ghost Type Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Muscle Band
Gear.Description: The holders Brawl Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Wise Glasses
Gear.Description: The holders Arcane Moves have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Black Sludge
Gear.Description: At the begining of each turn, if the Holder is Poison Type they Heal 1 wound. Otherwise they recieve 1 wound.

Gear.Name: Blunder Policy
Gear.Description: If the holders Move check fails and the Move had the inaccurate quality the holder gains Haste 2

Gear.Name: Weakness Policy
Gear.Description: When the holder suffers wounds from a Move it has weakness to Hone 2 and Wax 2

Gear.Name: Choice Band
Gear.Description: The first Move used by the holder has its base damge increased by 3 and gains the Locked In Property for the rest of the battle

Gear.Name: Choice Scarf
Gear.Description: At the beginning of battle the holder gains Haste 2 and the first their first Move used gains the Locked In Property for the rest of the battle

Gear.Name: Choice Specs
Gear.Description: At the beginning of battle the holder gains Wax 2 and the first their first Move used gains the Locked In Property for the rest of the battle

Gear.Name: Clear Amulet
Gear.Description: The holder is immune to Slow, Dull, Wane, Erode, and Discourage properties from sources other than itself

Gear.Name: Covert Cloak
Gear.Description: The holder is immune to all Properties from sources other than itself

Gear.Name: Damp Rock
Gear.Description: If the holder would cause Rain it becomes Heavy Rain instead

Gear.Name: Heat Rock
Gear.Description: If the holder would cause Harsh Sunlight it becomes Extremly Harsh Sunlight instead

Gear.Name: Icy Rock
Gear.Description: If the holder would cause Hail it becomes Hail Storm instead

Gear.Name: Smooth Rock
Gear.Description: If the holder would cause Sandstorm it becomes Dust Devil instead

Gear.Name: Terrain Extender
Gear.Description: Upgrade the difficulty to remove Battlefild Effects made by the holder

Gear.Name: Destiny Knot
Gear.Description: If the holder becomes Infatuated the Poke that caused it is also gains Infatuated

Gear.Name: Eject Button
Gear.Description: Once per battle when the holder recieves wounds from a Move with a range of engaged their trainer may take the switch action.

Gear.Name: Eject Pack
Gear.Description: Once per battle when the holder would be subject to Slow, Dull, Wane, Erode, or Discourage properties their trainer may take the switch action. If they do do not apply any Properties from the triggering source.

Gear.Name: Electric Seed
Gear.Description: If the battlefield gains Electric Terrain the Holder gains Fortify 1

Gear.Name: Grassy Seed
Gear.Description: If the battlefield gains Grassy Terrain the Holder gains Fortify 1

Gear.Name: Misty Seed
Gear.Description: If the battlefield gains Misty Terrain the Holder gains Encourage 1

Gear.Name: Psychic Seed
Gear.Description: If the battlefield gains Psychic Terrain the Holder gains Encourage 1

Gear.Name: Eviolite
Gear.Description: If the holder has the evolution Talent in their active Specailization increase their Defense and Special Defense by 2

Gear.Name: Expert Belt
Gear.Description: Moves used by the holder have their base damage increased by 1 if their targe is weak to the Moves Type.

Gear.Name: Flame Orb
Gear.Description: Holder gains the Burned Status Effect at the end of each of their turns

Gear.Name: Toxic Orb
Gear.Description: Holder gains the Poisoned 2 Status Effect at the end of each of their turns

Gear.Name: Life Orb
Gear.Description: Holders moves have their damage increased by 1 but sufferes 1 wound at the end of their turn

Gear.Name: Focus Band
Gear.Description: If the holders wounds exceed their wound treshold by 2 or less, they do not feint untill after their next turn or they take another wound which ever happens first.

Gear.Name: Focus Sash
Gear.Description: The Holder cannot take more wounds than their Wound Threshold from a single Move

Gear.Name: Lagging Tail
Gear.Description: The holder always acts last each round. If multple Pokes hold this item the roll initutive normally but all others go before them.

Gear.Name: Heavy-Duty Boots
Gear.Description: The holder is immune to Terrain and Entry Hazzards

Gear.Name: Iron Ball
Gear.Description: At the begining of battle the holder gains Slow 2 and is gounded as long as they hold it.

Gear.Name: Kings Rock
Gear.Description: The holders damaging Moves gain the Flinch Property

Gear.Name: Leek
Gear.Description: Holder gains advantage on all move checks or two advantage if holder is Farfetch'd

Gear.Name: Lucky Punch
Gear.Description: Holder gains advantage on all move checks or two advantage if holder is Chansey

Gear.Name: Razor Claw
Gear.Description: Holder gains two advantage on all move checks

Gear.Name: Scope Lens
Gear.Description: Holder gains two advantage on all move checks

Gear.Name: Leftovers
Gear.Description: Holder heals 1 wound at the end of each of their turns

Gear.Name: Loaded Dice
Gear.Description: Moves the holder uses with the linked property gain 2 free activations of the quality and have the rank of the quality increase by 1

Gear.Name: Lucky Egg
Gear.Description: Holder gains an addional 5xp after each battle they participate in

Gear.Name: Metronome
Gear.Description: After the holder makes a Move check add 1 base damage to the Move that was used and removes the bonus gratnted by this item to all the holders other Moves

Gear.Name: Mirror Herb
Gear.Description: Once per battle the holder can copy a stat increase used by an opponent

Gear.Name: Protective Pads
Gear.Description: Holder does not trigger effects that require an enemy to attack in engaged range

Gear.Name: Punching Gloves
Gear.Description: Moves the holder uses with Punch in the name have their base damage increased by 1

Gear.Name: Quick Claw
Gear.Description: Once per battle the holder can add the Quickness Property to a Move

Gear.Name: Razor Fang
Gear.Description: Add Flinch Property to all the holders Moves

Gear.Name: Red Card
Gear.Description: Once per battle when the holder suffers wounds from an enemy that enemy must be swapped out if possible

Gear.Name: Rocky Helmet
Gear.Description: When holder recives wounds from a Move with Range of engaged the user also suffers 1 wound

Gear.Name: Room Service
Gear.Description: When the holder is subject to Trick Room Slow 1 befor the effect of Trick Room

Gear.Name: Safety Goggles
Gear.Description: Holder does not take damage from Sandstorm and Is immune to Properties of Spore and Powder Moves

Gear.Name: Shed Shell
Gear.Description: Holder is immune to Properties activated by swapping

Gear.Name: Shell Bell
Gear.Description: When the holder inflicts wounds they heal 2 wounds

Gear.Name: Sticky Barb
Gear.Description: Holder suffers 1 wound at the end of each round. Is the holder is hit by a Move with range of engaged sticky barb is taken from the holder.

Gear.Name: Throat Spray
Gear.Description: Once per battle when the holder uses a Move with the volcal Property Wax 1

Gear.Name: Utility Unbrella
Gear.Description: Holder is immune to Rain, Heavy Rain, Harsh Sunlight, and Extremly Harsh Sunlight

Gear.Name: Wide Lens
Gear.Description: Holders Moves gain Accurate 1 if they already have Accurate increase its rank by 1

Gear.Name: Zoom Lens
Gear.Description: If the target of the Holders Move check has already gone this round the Move gains Accurate 2 if they already have Accurate increase its rank by 2
